{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02651v1", "title": "Quantized Markov chain couplings that prepare Qsamples", "summary": "We present a novel approach to quantizing Markov chains. The approach is
based on the Markov chain coupling method, which is frequently used to prove
fast mixing. Given a particular coupling, e.g., a grand coupling, we construct
a completely positive and trace preserving map. This quantum map has a unique
fixed point, which corresponds to the quantum sample (qsample) of the classical
Markov chain's stationary distribution. We show that the convergence time of
the quantum map is directly related to the coupling time of the Markov chain
coupling.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-03T14:48:47Z"}
